Escape to the Sunshine Coast - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Escape to the Sunshine Coast The clue is in the name to why people love the Sunshine Coast! With its diverse landscape from relaxing on one of the pristine beaches one minute to hiking in the peaks of the Glass House Mountains the next or sampling farm fresh produce with locals. Experience the Sunshine Coast and see why it has been named as one of the most loved destinations for yourself. Deal Details Travel Dates 12 Apr 2026 - 30 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Nov 16, 2025 Priced From $1,559 Enquire Now The clue is in the name to why people love the Sunshine Coast! With its diverse landscape from relaxing on one of the pristine beaches one minute to hiking in the peaks of the Glass House Mountains the next or sampling farm fresh produce with locals. Experience the Sunshine Coast and see why it has been named as one of the most loved destinations for yourself. Accommodation BreakFree Alexandra Beach (3 stars) Imaginatively designed around a 150m tropical lagoon pool, with 2 heated pools, waterslides and spas, BreakFree Alexandra Beach on the Sunshine Coast is ideally located directly opposite a patrolled surf beach and close to Mooloolaba. Rooms Studio Room (7 nights) 26 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,559.00 Bonus: FREE Wi-Fi Features Return Economy Class Airfares (The Works) flying Air New Zealand to Brisbane from Auckland 7 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, double share Coco Mooloolaba + Saltwater Eco Tours Bushtucker Cruise (4 stars) Coco Mooloolaba offers modern and spacious self-contained one and two bedroom apartments complete with generous balconies. The property features an outdoor pool and spa and barbeque entertainment area and is perfectly located just two minutes’ walk to the beautiful Beach, Coco Mooloolaba is the ideal base for a holiday on the Sunshine Coast. Saltwater Eco Tours Bushtucker Cruise - Step aboard Saltwater Eco Tours’ Bush Tucker Cruise and connect with the rich culture and flavours of the Sunshine Coast. Cruise the sparkling Mooloolah River aboard a beautifully restored heritage vessel while learning about local Indigenous history, traditions, and stories from knowledgeable guides. Savour a unique tasting experience featuring native bush-tucker inspired canapés, showcasing fresh regional ingredients and traditional flavours with a glass of Champagne, Beer or a non alcoholic beverage to sip as you board. Rooms One Bedroom Apartment (7 nights) 22 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,009.00 Bonus: Complimentary Use of Beach Cabanas, Beach Chairs, Beach Carts, Picnic Rugs and Cooler Bags. Includes: Saltwater Eco Tours Bushtucker Cruise Features Return Economy Class Airfares (The Works) flying Air New Zealand to Brisbane from Auckland 7 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, double share Noosa Blue Resort + Noosa Everglades Serenity Tour (4 stars) Centrally located between the convenience of Noosa Junction and the beauty of Noosa’s Main Beach, National Park and Hastings Street, Noosa Blue is the perfect spot for your holiday in Australia’s relaxation capital. Providing the perfect getaway for couples, singles or groups of friends the resort combines self-contained accommodation with impressive guest facilities including three outdoor heated swimming pools, steam room, gym, Yoga and Massage centre and an on site Cafe. Noosa Everglades on the Serenity Tour, a journey into one of only two Everglade systems in the world. Cruise the tranquil “River of Mirrors,” where calm waters reflect lush wetlands and ancient forests, as your guide shares fascinating insights with full commentary. Spot birdlife and native flora, and soak up the peaceful atmosphere of this untouched wilderness. To make the experience even more enjoyable, relax with a glass of beer, bubbles, or juice onboard. Rooms Garden View Suite (7 nights) 12 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,595.00 Includes: Noosa Everglades Serenity Tour Note: Blackout dates apply. 18-23 May 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares (The Works) flying Air New Zealand to Brisbane from Auckland 7 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, double share Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 07 November 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 07 November 2025 until 16 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Fare Basis: For travel: 12 Apr 26 - 30 Jun 26 - SWRKN21W ('S' Class). General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares are based on "The Works" economy class. A NZD10 one way surcharge applies for outbound travel on Thursday & Friday and inbound travel on Sunday & Monday. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply.Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs.Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
